channel.title: Whonix 11 Physical Isolation Build
channel.description:
1. There is no tag for 11.0.0.3.0-stable. Is 11.0.0.3.0-testers-only identical to the stable?
2. The build command from: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Build_Documentation/Physical_Isolation/11: ./whonix_build --tor-gateway --install-to-root --build no longer works. https://phabricator.whonix.org/T247 suggests: ./whonix_build --flavor whonix-gateway -- -- target root --build
Thanks.

item.title: Whonix 11 Physical Isolation Build
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
1. Yes, it’s the very same. (git diff 11.0.0.3.0-testers-only 11.0.0.3.0-stable) Tag created just now.

  2. Right.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 11 Physical Isolation Build
item.dc:creator: ypofeisi
item.description:
1. There is no tag for 11.0.0.3.0-stable. Is 11.0.0.3.0-testers-only identical to the stable?

  2. The build command from: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Build_Documentation/Physical_Isolation/11:
    ./whonix_build --tor-gateway --install-to-root --build
    no longer works.
    https://phabricator.whonix.org/T247 suggests:
    ./whonix_build --flavor whonix-gateway – -- target root --build

Thanks.

Read full topic
